Flash
When Protect the Stone enters the battlefield, put X 1/1 green Nopon creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is the number of creatures attacking you. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
rules_text2: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, if you cast it, you may search your library for a creature card with the same total power and toughness, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
